name: Davidson16807.github.io
body:
Hi there, and welcome to my webpage. 

I'm new here on github and the page you've reached will have to grow as time goes on. Until then, you might be interested in the earlier pages I've hosted on sourceforge and various other sites:

* [My Sourceforge user page](http://davidson1.users.sourceforge.net)

* [Technological savagery](http://technologicalsavagery.wordpress.com) - Some of my more recent work in 3d printing. My project is to create a self replicating 3d printer made from salvaged inkjet printers.

* [Pytectonics](http://pytectonics.sourceforge.net) - a 3d plate tectonics simulator written in Python
* [Pyzzle](http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyzzle) - a myst-like game engine written in Python

* [Dryzzle](http://cs.simpson.edu/Dryzzle/website) - one of my earlier works, a video game written in the aforementioned engine

* [My Oblivion Mods](http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/users/65665/?) - my work largely concerns Morrowind nostalgia mods such as those for the [Morroblivion project](http://morroblivion.com/). Also of note is a graphics user interface I pulled together for the Morroblivion conversion utility, [the ESP Modifier](http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/22880//?)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
